item.title: [Hyperion] NPC Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @joelandjacob joelandjacob
item.description:
@joelandjacob wrote:

Okay, i’ve been working on a Mole Rat system, and I finally started doing the dialogues last…

Here’s my code:

		//Mole Rat NPC
		case 150:
			sendNpcChat4("", "Would you like to defeat the", "Almighty Mole Rat?","", c.talkingNpc, "Charlie the Tramp");
			c.nextChat = 151;
			break;
		case 151:
			sendOption2("Yes I want to fight!", "No, he's too powerful for me!");
			c.dtOption = true;
			break;
		case 152:
			sendPlayerChat1("Yes I want to fight!");
			c.nextChat = 154;
			break;
		case 153:
			sendPlayerChat1("No, he's too powerful for me!");
			c.nextChat = 0;
			break;
		case 154:
			c.getPA().movePlayer(1760, 5186, c.height);
			c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
			break;

As you can see, if you pick “Yes” it should send you to case 154…
But no, it sends you to case 51 which is a desert treasure quest npc… It’s all fucked up… Can someone help me?

Read full topic
